content.rendered:
Our face’s skin shrinks, stretches and moves in different ways thousands of times per day due to our facial expressions which are produced by the movements of our facial muscles. Therefore, at a young age the first wrinkles make their appearance on our skin. Over the years, due to the combination of sun exposure ,natural gravity ,excessive facial movement and genetic pre- disposition,our skin’s collagen weakens and these wrinkles multiply and become deeper. Anti –wrinkle injections contain the active ingredient called botulinum toxin ,which is a purified protein produced by the Clostridium Botulinum bacteria, and acts a neuromodulator. A small amount of neuromodulator is injected into the muscles that are responsible for creating wrinkles and by temporarily blocking certain chemical signals from nerves, which cause these muscles to contract, it relaxes them. Thus, the lines and the wrinkles diminish dramatically and the skin over them looks smoother and more youthful. The areas in which Dysport is injected contain:
• Horizontal forehead lines also known as glabellar lines
• Frown lines
• Crow’s feet also known as laughter lines
• Bunny lines
• Marionette lines
• Gummy smile-Smile with over exposure of the upper teeth and gums
• Chin-Peau d’orange
